title: The Toll Bridge
description: A simple adventure demonstrating the gold cost feature. You need to cross a bridge guarded by trolls who demand payment.

nodes.title: The Road
nodes.description: You stand at a crossroads. To the north is a bridge crossing a deep ravine. The bridge is guarded by trolls who charge a toll. To the south is the town where you can find treasure.

choices.text: Go to town and search for gold

nodes.title: The Town Square
nodes.description: You explore the town and find some merchants willing to pay for odd jobs.

nodes.title: The Toll Bridge
nodes.description: A massive troll blocks your path. 'Pay 30 gold to cross!' he demands in a booming voice.

nodes.title: Beyond the Bridge
nodes.description: You made it across! On the other side, you find a treasure chest containing riches beyond measure!
